text: Facundo Sánchez (born 7 March 1990) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a right back for Greek club Panathinaikos. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Club Atlético Colón footballers Category:Defensa y Justicia footballers Category:Club Atlético Tigre footballers Category:Estudiantes de La Plata footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Facundo Sánchez
